concept.title: Supporting the BSICC2017 compliance mode
concept.shortdesc: The provides an access control point (ACP) to enable the BSICC2017 compliance mode. When enabled, this compliance mode disables the RSA PKCS #1 v1.5 mechanisms.

keywords.indexterm: BSICC2017 compliance mode access control point
access control point BSICC2017 compliance mode

conbody.p: The supports access control point 61 which is related to the BSICC2017 compliance mode.
conbody.codeblock: 61 XCP_CPB_ALG_NBSI2017 enable the BSICC2017 compliance mode
